key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party foundries and suppliers, particularly in Asia
Geopolitical risks from operations in China and Taiwan, including U.S.-China trade tensions and regional instability
Legal disputes, including securities law violations and historical litigation related to employment practices
Environmental and regulatory compliance risks, particularly with global regulations like RoHS and REACH
Labor disputes, especially at the Shanghai facility, raising ethical and operational concerns
controversies: Securities law violations related to labor issues at the Shanghai facility
Historical litigation such as Diodes, Inc. v. Franzen highlighting employment practice challenges
environmental_issues: Compliance with global environmental regulations like RoHS and REACH
Reliance on suppliers to adhere to environmental standards, introducing potential compliance risks
social_issues: Labor disputes and ethical concerns at the Shanghai facility
Potential impact of labor practices on company reputation and financial performance
governance_issues: Legal disputes and securities law violations indicating potential governance and transparency risks
Challenges in employment practices and competitive business interests

sources.title: Diodes Incorporated Pay & Benefits reviews - Indeed
sources.snippet: The most unorganized company I've ever worked with, didn't really offer much benefits, no literal way to move up in the workforce, very low pay for what we work for especially having to handle dangerous chemicals and gases, management is terrible and have no respect to their workers. favoritism is huge here, especially for the higher ups. Would not recommend this job whatsoever.
